product_name: Picnic At Ascot Cheshire Picnic Basket for 2 with Blanket
long_description: Beautifully handcrafted from natural reed willow, the sophisticated Cheshire Picnic Basket for 2 with Blanket from Picnic At Ascot includes ceramic plates and actual glass wine glasses. Willow basket features real leather hinges, handle and straps; included 50 x 60 in. fleece blanket straps to the side. Includes 2 each of ceramic plates, glass wine glasses, stainless-steel 3-piece flatware sets (knife, fork and spoon) and cotton napkins. Included food cooler and wine pouch keep consumables chilled. Also includes a stainless-steel waiter's corkscrew, spillproof salt and pepper shakers, hardwood cutting board and wood-handled cheese knife. Cheshire Picnic Basket for 2 with Blanket from Picnic At Ascot measures 20 x 15 x 9 in.
short_description: Beautifully handcrafted from natural reed willow, the sophisticated Cheshire Picnic Basket for 2 with Blanket from Picnic At Ascot includes ceramic plates and actual glass wine glasses.
